
PAHIL MOSE PUTHI.

11 Etghgpre Isor do serma ar gte 
• sirjaukefa. 2 Ar gt dg almal ar 
sunge tahekana; ar nut atliantar eetan- 
re tahSkana; arlsorren Jiu do dakko 
cetanreye mandraok kan tahSkana. 
3 Khange Isore menke£a, Marsal ho- 
yok ma ; ado marsal hoyena. 4 Ar Isor 
do marsale nelke£a bogegea mente ; ar 
Isor marsal do nut khone begarkefa. 
5 Ar Isor marsal do sine meta£a, ar 
nut do nindai meta£a. Ar ayupena ar 
setakena — pahii dinge. 

6 Ar Isore menkefa, Mi£te&lt;5 pasnao- 
ak hoyok ma dakko talare, ar ona do 
dakkoge dakko khone begar ma. 7 Ar 
Isor do ona pasnaoak benaokate pas- 
naoak latar reak dakko do pasnaoak 
cetan reak dakko khone begarkefa. 
Ar onka hoyena. 8 Ar Isor pasnaoak 
do sermae metafa. Ar ayupena, ar 
setakena — dosar dinge. 

9 Ar Isore menke£a, Serma latar 
reak dakko do mi£ thaire samtao jar- 
wak ma, ar rohorak- rielok ma ; ar onka 
hoyena. 1° Ar Isor rohorak do gte 
metafa ; ar dak samtao jarwawak do 
jalapuriye metafa. Ar Isore rielke£a 
bogegea mente. H Ar Isore menke£a, 
Ote janam ma ghasko, itak arakko, 
apan apin jat leka itawanak jo jgk 
dareko pirthimire. Ar onka hoyena. 

12 Ar ot do ghasko, itawanak arakko 
apan apin jat leka ar itawanak jo jok 
dareko apan apin jat lekae omon- 
ke£a. Ar Isore nelkefa bogegea mente. 

13 Ar ayupena ar setakena — tesar 
dinge.

akre siritet riinda' khon begar lagif,

hoyok ma. 15 Ar onako do senna reak 
pasnaoakre mamarsalakko lagi£ hoyok 
ma pirthimire marsal lagitge. Ar on- 
ka hoyena. H&gt; Ar Isor do barea maran 
mamarsalake benaokefa, maran ma- 
marsalakte£ do siri calao lagit', ar hudin 
mamarsalakt@£ do riinda calao lagi£, 
aripilko. 17 Ar Isor do serma reak 
pasnaoakre onakoe dohoke£a pirthi- 
mire -marsal lagi£, 18 ar sin cetanre ar 
riinda cetanre ektiari calao lagi£ ar 
marsalteC riut khon begar lagifge. Ar 
Isore rielke£a bogegea m§nte. &amp; l9 Ar 
ayupena ar setakena— ponak dinge. 

20 Ar Isore menke£a ; Dakko do 
sobo£ sobodok ma sobo£ sobodok jive£ 
jiviankote, ar udaukko do pirthimi 
cotreko udauk ma serma" pasnaoak 
latarre. 21 Ar Isor dg dakren haprak 
silodako ar sanam laraok kan jive£ 
jivianko, gne onkote dakko dg sobo£ 
sobodok kan, apan apin jat leka, ar 
sanam phakrakan udaukko apan apin 
jat lekae sirjaukefkoa. Ar Isore riel- 
ke£a bogegea mente. 22 Ar Isor do 
bhgra£koteye menketa, Badokpe ar 
sangekpe ar jalapuri reak dakko 
perejpe, ar udaukko do pirthimireko 
sangek ma. 23 Ar ayupena ar setak- 
ena — mgrgak dinge.

jiviankoe upcauko ma ako akoak jat

ko ar pirthimiren janwarko ako ako- 
ak jat lekage. Ar onka hoyena. 25 Ar

1. 26- 



Iaor do pirtbimiren janwarko ako ako- 
ak jat leka ar mihu meromko ako ako- 
ak jat leka ar otre sanam lenok-tun- 
4ankoako akoak jatlekageye benao- 
ketkoa. Ar Isore nelke*a bogegea 
mente. 26 Ar Isore menkefa, Manwa- 
bon benaoko ma abonak muthanan, 
abohak urgan lekage far onko do jala- 
puriren bakoko cetanre ar cotren 
ufoukko cetanre ar mibu merQmko 
cetanre ar gota pirtbimi cetanre ar 
pirtbimire lenok-tundan sanam lenok- 
tunflanko cetanre ektiariko calaoa. 
27 Ar Isor aeak urganan do manwae 
sirjaukedea, Isor reak urganangeye 
sirjaukedea ; berel ar maejiugeye sir- 
jaukelkina. 

28 Ar Isor doe bbora*kina ; ar Isor 
doe meta*kina,~Ma bidokpe ar sangek- 
pe ar pirtbimi perejpe ar ona janga 
latar jonpe, ar jalapuriren bakoko ce- 
tanre ar cotren ufoukko cetanre ar 
otre l^nok-tun^an mi*ke. mi* jivianko 
cetanre ektiari calaope. 29 Ar Isore 
menketa, Nelbeu, mi* ke mi* itak 
arak, okatak gota pirtbimire menak, 
Ar mi* ke. mi* dare, okatakre itak 
dare-jo menak don em akawa*pea ; 
ape l^gi* jomakge boyoka. 30 Ar pir- 
tbimiren mi* ke mi* janwar lagi* ar 
cotren mi* ke. mif u^aukic" lagi* ar 
pirtbimire mi* ke mi* lenok-tundani6 
lagi* one. okoere jive* jivi menak do 
mi* ke mi* bariap arakgen em aka- 
wa*koa jomak nutumte. Ar onka bo- 
yena. 3i Ar Isor dQ okatake benao 
aka* saname nelke*a, ar nelme, a&lt;Ji 
bogegea. Ar ayupena ar setakena — tu- 
ruiak dinge. 

2 1 Ar serma ar ot do satena ar 
• onakinren sanam pbadko. 2 Ar 
Isor do eae maba bilokre acak kamiye 
satke*a, one okatake kami aka* ; ar

joto kami kbon, one okatake kami 
aka*. 3 Ar Isor do eae maba biloktete 



bbora*a ar onae sonotka*a, onareye 
jirauen teron adak joto kami kbon, 
one okatak Isore sir j an are benaoke*. 

Pahil manwakin reabt.

akko onakin one sirjauenre, Probbu 
Isor ot sermae benaoke* dinrege. 5 Ar 
tandi reatt jaban por do auri hoyoka 
pirtbimire, ar tandi reak jaban arak 
do auri omonoka ; §nte, Probbu Isor 
do oae dak oco aka* tabSkana pirtbi- 
mire, ar cele manwa bo bako tabS- 
kana ot abad lagi*. 6 Menkban kubra 
ge ot kbon rakabok kan tabekana, 
ar ona do ot reak go{a cetante*e odaye* 
tabSkana. 7 Kbange Probbu Isor do 
ot reak dburiren manwae garbaoke- 
dea ar jion reak sabe* uniak raureye 
onadea ; ado manwa mi*ten jive* jivi- 
anide hoyena.

ar jom lagi* boge darekoe omon oco- 
ke*a ar jion reak dare do tala bag wan -

GENESIS 



Probhu Isor ig manwa hukumadeteye 
menke£a, Bagwan veak JQto dare reak 
do kliatirjomam jgmgea ; 17 menkhan 
boge baric* badae okrom dare reak, ona 
reak do alogem joma; ente ona reakem 
jomle hilok khatigem gujuRa. 

18 Ar Probhu Isor doe raenke£a, 
Manwa eskar tahen do ban bogea ; 
mi£ten gokroic in benaoaea uni leka. 
19 Ar Probhu Isor do tandiren sanam 
janwarko ar cotren sanam udaukko 
dohasarene garhao aka£ko tahekana; 
ar manwa thene aguke£koa riel lagi£ 
cele celeye riutumkoa mente, ar man- 
wa mimi£ mimi£ jive£ jivian jaha- 
take iiutumke£ko, ona do onkoak riu- 
tumge. 20 Ado manwa sanam mihii t 
meromko ar cotren udaukko ar tandi- 
ren sanam janwarkoe riutumka£koa ; 
menkhan manwa lagi£ do gokroic bae 
namledea ac leka. 21 Ar Probhu Isor 
man ware aeet japi£eparao ocoke£teye 
japi£ke£a ; ar uniak panjarko modre 
m ^ RQtec hataoke£te ona bodole jel 
esefketa. 22 Ar Probhu Isor do, one 
manwa khone hataoke£ panjarren do 
mi£ten maejiue benaokedea, ar manwa 
thene agukadea. 23 Khange manwae 
menket'a, Nukui nit enec in jan reak jan 
ar in jel reak jelge ; nui do herel riniee 
numogoka, ente herel reak kbone ha- j 
tao o$okena nui do. 24 Ona iate herel | 
hor do acren engat apat bagiakinte ac I 
rinie thene jamar akan tahena, ar mi£ | 
jelgekin hoyoka. 25 Ar banarge ulun- 
kin tahekana, manwa ar uni rime do, 
ar bakin lajaok kan tahekana. 

Aboren pahil enga apa kaikekin

barae kan Probhu Isor reak sabadkin

adeteye metadea, Okare menania ?

anjomketa bagwanre, ar in botorena 
inin ulun teron ; adgri okoYeria. t-1 Adoe

mente ? Ban do ona* dare reakem jom 
aka£, one okatak rean in hukuma£me 
ona reak alom joma mente? 12 Ar

unige ona dare reake emadina, adon 
jgmke£a. 13 Khange Probhu Isor do

bulaukidina, adon jomkefa.

ar uni dg am cetanre huktime calaoa. 
17 Ar Adam dge metadea, Am rinic 
reak rgrem anjomkeftae ar ona dare 
reakem jgmkef tergn, gng okafak rean 
id hukumafane, ban ma, ona reak alom 
jgma, gt dg sarapgea am gunakte.

jivgt reaK jgtg dinge. 18 Ar ona do ja- 
nura ar rangainigeye janamama, ar

jgma hasate anrim ruarok dhabic;

ente dhuri kangeam, ar dburitem 
rnaroka.

nutumkedea, uni do sanam jivgtkoren
